comment:
Variables:
- x: number of regular batches
- y: number of premium batches

Constraints:
- Medicinal_Ingredients: 50x + 40y \leq 3000
- Rehydration_Product: 40x + 60y \leq 3500
- Regular_Batches_Minimum: x \geq 10
- Regular_Batches_Less_Than_Premium: x \leq y

Objective:
- Maximize 50x + 30y
